Posts.EditableText:
Hello gang,

Sorry I have not been around for a couple of months but I have been real busy with a new band I joined.

Interestingly enough, the band is called "Axe" and they have been around for a long time.  They had a top ten hit in 1982 here in the states.  Anyway, they are doing a tour that includes a few weeks in Europe.  

I do not know if I am allowed to give out the dates yet or not so I'll play it safe and just say that in September I will be playing dates in Europe.  (There is one for sure in London...is that close to any of you guys).

Well, I'll give out more info as I can.  When I can post the full schedule I will and maybe I'll get to meet some of you.

Take care,
Michael

Posts.EditableText: O.K. Most of the dates for the tour are posted on the Axe Myspace site. (Though there are still a few TBA's in the mix). Go to myspace and search by the email for quick results (axelives@hotmail.com). You can see some cool pictures and here some tunes and see the calender. Let me know if any of you can make those dates and I'll get you everything you need (tickets/backstage/etc..) Take care, Michael

Posts.EditableText: After going to your blog, which linked to your myspace which linked via friends list to the band, the date for London is now known to be 19th September, which I should be able to make. Posts.EditableText:
Hey, it would be great if you could make it out.  I'll talk to the tour manager and get you a couple of passes (it would seem strange for you to go to something like that by yourself).  I know I can get you 2 for sure, but if you need a third let me know and I'll get on it right away.

I guess I'll have more info closer to time.  Believe it or not they are still finalizing some of the dates.

If anyone else thinks they can make something on the tour, please let me know because I would love to meet as many overseas Quest people as I could.

Michael
